collectors.title: Database
collectors.titleDetails: (8 total Queries, 8 of them unique across 1 Connection)

queries.sql: SELECT `violations`.*, `students`.`nisn`, `student_users`.`full_name` as `student_name`, `classes`.`class_name`, `violation_categories`.`category_name`, `violation_categories`.`severity_level`, `violation_categories`.`point_deduction`, `reporter_users`.`full_name` as `reporter_name`, `handler_users`.`full_name` as `handler_name` FROM `violations` JOIN `students` ON `students`.`id` = `violations`.`student_id` JOIN `users` as `student_users` ON `student_users`.`id` = `students`.`user_id` LEFT JOIN `classes` ON `classes`.`id` = `students`.`class_id` JOIN `violation_categories` ON `violation_categories`.`id` = `violations`.`category_id` JOIN `users` as `reporter_users` ON `reporter_users`.`id` = `violations`.`reported_by` LEFT JOIN `users` as `handler_users` ON `handler_users`.`id` = `violations`.`handled_by` WHERE `violations`.`handled_by` = 15 AND `violations`.`deleted_at` IS NULL ORDER BY `violations`.`violation_date` DESC, `violations`.`created_at` DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) as total_violations, SUM(CASE WHEN status = "Dilaporkan" THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as reported, SUM(CASE WHEN status = "Dalam Proses" THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as in_process, SUM(CASE WHEN status = "Selesai" THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as completed, SUM(CASE WHEN status = "Dibatalkan" THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as cancelled, SUM(CASE WHEN is_repeat_offender = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as repeat_offenders, SUM(CASE WHEN parent_notified = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as parents_not_notified FROM `violations` WHERE `deleted_at` IS NULL

SELECT `students`.`id`, `students`.`nisn`, `users`.`full_name` as `student_name`, `classes`.`class_name`, COUNT(violations.id) as violation_count, SUM(violation_categories.point_deduction) as total_points, MAX(violations.violation_date) as last_violation_date FROM `violations` JOIN `students` ON `students`.`id` = `violations`.`student_id` JOIN `users` ON `users`.`id` = `students`.`user_id` LEFT JOIN `classes` ON `classes`.`id` = `students`.`class_id` JOIN `violation_categories` ON `violation_categories`.`id` = `violations`.`category_id` WHERE `violations`.`deleted_at` IS NULL AND `violations`.`status` != 'Dibatalkan' GROUP BY `students`.`id` ORDER BY `violation_count` DESC LIMIT 5

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: SELECT `violations`.*, `students`.`nisn`, `student_users`.`full_name` as `student_name`, `classes`.`class_name`, `violation_categories`.`category_name`, `violation_categories`.`severity_level`, `violation_categories`.`point_deduction`, `reporter_users`.`full_name` as `reporter_name`, `handler_users`.`full_name` as `handler_name` FROM `violations` JOIN `students` ON `students`.`id` = `violations`.`student_id` JOIN `users` as `student_users` ON `student_users`.`id` = `students`.`user_id` LEFT JOIN `classes` ON `classes`.`id` = `students`.`class_id` JOIN `violation_categories` ON `violation_categories`.`id` = `violations`.`category_id` JOIN `users` as `reporter_users` ON `reporter_users`.`id` = `violations`.`reported_by` LEFT JOIN `users` as `handler_users` ON `handler_users`.`id` = `violations`.`handled_by` WHERE `violations`.`handled_by` = 15 AND `violations`.`deleted_at` IS NULL ORDER BY `violations`.`violation_date` DESC, `violations`.`created_at` DESC

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: SELECT COUNT(*) as total_violations, SUM(CASE WHEN status = "Dilaporkan" THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as reported, SUM(CASE WHEN status = "Dalam Proses" THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as in_process, SUM(CASE WHEN status = "Selesai" THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as completed, SUM(CASE WHEN status = "Dibatalkan" THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as cancelled, SUM(CASE WHEN is_repeat_offender = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as repeat_offenders, SUM(CASE WHEN parent_notified = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as parents_not_notified FROM `violations` WHERE `deleted_at` IS NULL

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: SELECT `students`.`id`, `students`.`nisn`, `users`.`full_name` as `student_name`, `classes`.`class_name`, COUNT(violations.id) as violation_count, SUM(violation_categories.point_deduction) as total_points, MAX(violations.violation_date) as last_violation_date FROM `violations` JOIN `students` ON `students`.`id` = `violations`.`student_id` JOIN `users` ON `users`.`id` = `students`.`user_id` LEFT JOIN `classes` ON `classes`.`id` = `students`.`class_id` JOIN `violation_categories` ON `violation_categories`.`id` = `violations`.`category_id` WHERE `violations`.`deleted_at` IS NULL AND `violations`.`status` != 'Dibatalkan' GROUP BY `students`.`id` ORDER BY `violation_count` DESC LIMIT 5
